analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoMiningWar.buyBooster (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#539-565):
	External calls:
	- gameSponsor = Engineer.gameSponsor() (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#546-547)
	External calls sending eth:
	- gameSponsor.transfer(devFeePrize) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#547)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- boostData (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#560-561)
	- boostData (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#561)
	- boostData (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#562)

CryptoMiningWar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#585-599) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr

CryptoMiningWar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#585-599) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr
CryptoMiningWar.isCurrentRound (/unique_chucks/3/0x1b002cd1ba79dfad65e8abfbb3a97826e4960fe5.sol#172-177) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(players[_addr].roundNumber == roundNumber)
	- require(bool)(players[_addr].roundNumber == roundNumber)
